ai-snp4.3:1.1_0: slaughtered in the presence of a single one,
ai-snp4.3:1.2_0: and they say that also speak the truth.
ai-snp4.3:1.3_0: whether the sage has born, not true.
ai-snp4.3:1.4_0: That’s why you don’t become a sage.
ai-snp4.3:2.1_0: If you’d do what you need,
ai-snp4.3:2.3_0: having himself done it himself, spoke about it.
ai-snp4.3:3.1_0: He who is virtuous, devoted to his own virtue,
ai-snp4.3:3.3_0: what is not wholesome and what is good,
ai-snp4.3:4.2_0: This is the meaning of virtue:
ai-snp4.3:4.3_0: say that profitable thing they speak of the noble ones.
ai-snp4.3:4.4_0: He may proclaim himself a brahmin,
ai-snp4.3:5.3_0: when he sees a benefit in each and every way,
ai-snp4.3:6.1_0: Doing so, you must not live too surely.
ai-snp4.3:6.3_0: That’s why you shouldn’t stay in your home.
ai-snp4.3:6.4_0: He sees the truth, and the language of the Dhamma,
ai-snp4.3:7.1_0: For there is no anger in the world,
ai-snp4.3:8.1_0: for they surget on each other.
ai-snp4.3:8.2_0: How should I say that a person who is without a doubt?
ai-snp4.3:8.3_0: for you have no shelter or calm,
